mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER ( EMAIL, PW, NAME, NICK, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, JOB, PHONE, USER_TYPE, CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{birthdate}, #{gender}, #{job}, #{phone}, #{userType}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NAME, NICK, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, JOB, PHONE, USER_TYPE, CREATE_DT FROM TB_USER WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PW = #{pw}
